# admiraldev

Utility Functions and Development Tools for the Admiral Package Family

*Explore all the other packages in the [{admiral}
ecosystem](https://pharmaverse.org/e2eclinical/adam/) to learn more
about ADaM programming in R.*

## Purpose

Functions, tools and documentation for developing core
[admiral](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/) and extension package
functions. Most functions in
[admiraldev](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/) are around
testing inputs going into functions. There are also additional quality
of life functions/Addins to assist developers of
[admiral](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/) or
[admiral](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/) extension packages,
functions to help with rendering documentation, Developer Guides on
developing function and using GitHub, GitHub Actions.

**NOTE:** This package is not intended for standalone use but rather as
a central dependency for
[admiral](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/) and its extension
packages

## Installation

The package is available from CRAN and can be installed by running
`install.packages("admiraldev")`.

To install the latest development version of the package directly from
GitHub use the following code:

``` R
if (!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("remotes")
}

remotes::install_github("pharmaverse/admiraldev")
```

## Release Schedule

[admiraldev](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/) is to be
released to CRAN at the same time as an official release of
[admiral](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/). You can find the
release schedule for [admiral](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/)
packages
[here](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/#release-schedule).

# Package index

## Assertion Functions

Checks the inputs for user-facing functions and provides error, warnings
and other messaging around expectation of inputs.

- [`assert_atomic_vector()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_atomic_vector.md)
  : Is an Argument an Atomic Vector?
- [`assert_character_scalar()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_character_scalar.md)
  : Is an Argument a Character Scalar (String)?
- [`assert_character_vector()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_character_vector.md)
  : Is an Argument a Character Vector?
- [`assert_data_frame()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_data_frame.md)
  : Is an Argument a Data Frame?
- [`assert_date_var()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_date_var.md)
  : Is a Variable in a Dataset a Date or Datetime Variable?
- [`assert_date_vector()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_date_vector.md)
  : Is an object a date or datetime vector?
- [`assert_expr()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_expr.md)
  : Assert Argument is an Expression
- [`assert_expr_list()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_expr_list.md)
  : Is an Argument a List of Expressions?
- [`assert_filter_cond()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_filter_cond.md)
  : Is an Argument a Filter Condition?
- [`assert_function()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_function.md)
  : Is Argument a Function?
- [`assert_integer_scalar()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_integer_scalar.md)
  : Is an Argument an Integer Scalar?
- [`assert_list_element()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_list_element.md)
  : Is an Element of a List of Lists/Classes Fulfilling a Condition?
- [`assert_list_of()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_list_of.md)
  : Is an Argument a List of Objects of a Specific S3 Class or Type?
- [`assert_logical_scalar()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_logical_scalar.md)
  : Is an Argument a Logical Scalar (Boolean)?
- [`assert_named()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_named.md)
  : Assert Argument is a Named List or Vector
- [`assert_numeric_vector()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_numeric_vector.md)
  : Is an Argument a Numeric Vector?
- [`assert_one_to_one()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_one_to_one.md)
  : Is There a One to One Mapping between Variables?
- [`assert_param_does_not_exist()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_param_does_not_exist.md)
  : Asserts That a Parameter Does Not Exist in the Dataset
- [`assert_s3_class()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_s3_class.md)
  : Is an Argument an Object of a Specific S3 Class?
- [`assert_same_type()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_same_type.md)
  : Are All Arguments of the Same Type?
- [`assert_symbol()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_symbol.md)
  : Is an Argument a Symbol?
- [`assert_unit()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_unit.md)
  : Asserts That a Parameter is Provided in the Expected Unit
- [`assert_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_vars.md)
  : Is an Argument a List of Variables?
- [`assert_varval_list()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/assert_varval_list.md)
  : Is an Argument a Variable-Value List?

## Get Functions

Gets information or input from an object

- [`get_constant_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/get_constant_vars.md)
  : Get Constant Variables

- [`get_dataset()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/get_dataset.md)
  :

  Retrieve a Dataset from the `admiraldev_environment` environment

- [`get_duplicates()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/get_duplicates.md)
  : Get Duplicates From a Vector

- [`get_source_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/get_source_vars.md)
  : Get Source Variables from a List of Expressions

## Is Functions

Is the object what it says it is

- [`is_auto()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/is_auto.md)
  : Checks if the argument equals the auto keyword
- [`is_order_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/is_order_vars.md)
  : Is order vars?
- [`is_valid_dtc()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/is_valid_dtc.md)
  : Is this string a valid DTC

## What Functions

What type of object is this?

## Warning Functions

Custom warnings intended for users

- [`suppress_warning()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/suppress_warning.md)
  : Suppress Specific Warnings
- [`warn_if_incomplete_dtc()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/warn_if_incomplete_dtc.md)
  : Warn if incomplete dtc
- [`warn_if_inconsistent_list()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/warn_if_inconsistent_list.md)
  : Warn If Two Lists are Inconsistent
- [`warn_if_invalid_dtc()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/warn_if_invalid_dtc.md)
  : Warn If a Vector Contains Unknown Datetime Format
- [`warn_if_vars_exist()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/warn_if_vars_exist.md)
  : Warn If a Variable Already Exists

## Test Helper Functions

Test Utilities that help with organization and presentation of tests

- [`expect_dfs_equal()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/expect_dfs_equal.md)
  : Expectation: Are Two Datasets Equal?

## Temporary Variables

Tools for creating and removing temporary variables within a dataset

- [`get_new_tmp_var()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/get_new_tmp_var.md)
  : Get a New Temporary Variable Name for a Dataset
- [`remove_tmp_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/remove_tmp_vars.md)
  : Remove All Temporary Variables Created Within the Current Function
  Environment

## Quosure Helper Functions

Helping your quosure needs

- [`add_suffix_to_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/add_suffix_to_vars.md)
  : Add a Suffix to Variables in a List of Expressions
- [`expr_c()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/expr_c.md)
  : Concatenate One or More Expressions
- [`replace_symbol_in_expr()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/replace_symbol_in_expr.md)
  : Replace Symbols in an Expression
- [`replace_values_by_names()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/replace_values_by_names.md)
  : Replace Expression Value with Name

## Quoting Helper Functions

Helping your quoting needs

- [`backquote()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/backquote.md)
  : Wrap a String in Backquotes
- [`dquote()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/dquote.md)
  : Wrap a String in Double Quotes
- [`squote()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/squote.md)
  : Wrap a String in Single Quotes

## Utilities used within Derivation Functions

- [`process_set_values_to()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/process_set_values_to.md)
  :

  Process `set_values_to` Argument

## Documentation Functions

Functions for generating documentation

- [`capture_output()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/capture_output.md)
  : Capture Output and Messages
- [`parse_code()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/parse_code.md)
  : Parse Code
- [`rdx_roclet()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/rdx_roclet.md)
  : Roclet Extending the Standard rd Roclet

## Miscellaneous

Utilities without a theme

- [`contains_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/contains_vars.md)
  :

  check that argument contains valid variable(s) created with `exprs()`
  or Source Variables from a List of Expressions

- [`convert_dtm_to_dtc()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/convert_dtm_to_dtc.md)
  : Helper Function to Convert Date (or Date-time) Objects to Characters
  of dtc Format (-DTC type of variable)

- [`dataset_vignette()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/dataset_vignette.md)
  : Output a Dataset in a Vignette in the admiral Format

- [`extract_vars()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/extract_vars.md)
  : Extract All Symbols from a List of Expressions

- [`filter_if()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/filter_if.md)
  : Optional Filter

- [`` `%notin%` ``](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/grapes-notin-grapes.md)
  : Negated Value Matching

- [`vars2chr()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/vars2chr.md)
  : Turn a List of Expressions into a Character Vector

- [`deprecate_inform()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/deprecate_inform.md)
  : Deprecation with Soft Message

## Deprecated

Functions and arguments may need to be removed or replaced over time. In
such cases, the function or argument will enter a 3 year deprecation
cycle. The cycle will be tied as close as sensibly possible to a package
release.

When a function is deprecated:

- In Year 1 there will be a message issued if you use the
  function/argument, but it will still be available to use.
- In Year 2 a warning will be produced if you use the function/argument,
  but it will still be available to use.
- In Year 3, an error will be produced if you use the function/argument
  and no longer be able to use.
- Finally, after 3 years, the function/argument and related
  documentation and tests will be removed from
  [admiral](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiral/).

*Note: Guidance on replacement functionality will be found in the
message produced as well as in the functionâ€™s documentation*

Below, you can find a list of functions in the process of being
deprecated:

- [`arg_name()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/arg_name.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Extract Argument Name from an Expression
- [`enumerate()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/enumerate.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Enumerate Multiple Elements
- [`friendly_type_of()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/friendly_type_of.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Return English-friendly messaging for
  object-types
- [`` `%or%` ``](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/grapes-or-grapes.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Or
- [`valid_time_units()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/valid_time_units.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Valid Time Units
- [`what_is_it()`](https://pharmaverse.github.io/admiraldev/reference/what_is_it.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : What Kind of Object is This?
